title: Amanda's Guide to Love
description: Guideline #13: Steer clear of handsome men. Never marry such a man, even if you love him. Love has nothing to do with marriage.From A Woman’s Guide to Perfection———————————————Parisian career girl Amanda Roussel worships perfection. Not only does she believe every word in her instructive "Guide", but she lives by those words.Small wonder she’s so lonely!Professional gambler Kes Moreno worships freedom. But when the Gypsy heartthrob falls for Amanda, he knows he’s in a fix. Despite their passion and friendship, she’s too aloof to see how perfect they are for each other.Will Amanda let a man like Kes melt her armored heart?“Amanda's Guide to Love” is a standalone contemporary romance. Inspired by “Taming of the Shrew”, this sweetly sexy Kindle Scout winner will delight fans of romantic comedy and humorous novels alike.READER BEWARE: Kes Moreno will gamble with your heart.
author: Alix Nichols
